{"icon":{"type":"emoji","emoji":"❗"},"color":"gray_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"CUIはGUIでの操作よりもエラーが起こりやすい傾向にあります。\nもしカリキュラムとは異なる表示やエラー（","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"Error","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"）が表示された場合には遠慮せず基礎班運営や発展班の人に頼ってください。","href":null}]}
